title: Review of the Vitamix Professional Series 300 Blender
description:
Buy Now - http://www.abt.com/product/63522/Vitamix-1830.html
Shop Blenders - http://abt.com/category/668/Blenders.html

Quickly and easily prepare restaurant-quality meals from the comfort of home with ultra-responsive controls a quieter motor and more elegant design. The Variable Speed Dial and Pulse feature allow you to prepare ingredients and create recipes to your exact specifications.
Features:
• Create smoothies soups and frozen desserts in a single machine.
• Small size conveniently fits under cabinets
• Newly designed 64-ounce container is perfect for family meals and entertaining while fitting comfortably under most kitchen cabinets.
• Full-color hardbound Create cookbook includes exquisite recipes from gourmet chefs and a tutorial DVD hosted by Chef Michael Voltaggio.
• Easy-to-use equipment paired with extreme versatility
• The ability to chop cream blend heat grind churn and more with a single machine
• Quick and easy self-cleaning with a drop of dish soap and warm water; just run on High for 30 seconds
• 7-year full warranty - Industrys best
• Ongoing recipe ideas and community support
